DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety fluticasone furoate/vilanterol ( GW642444 ) inhalation powder administer daily even fluticasone furoate inhalation powder administer alone daily even adolescent adult subject 12 year age old persistent bronchial asthma 24-week period .
